channel.title: Hey i havea question about items:)
channel.description:
ok i have the galkons pride client , and i use devolution v7 server, can someone help me figure out why the commands i add to spawn pink armor wont work?
[code]15107-Ladies Platelegs 15105-Ladies ChainMail 15103-Ladies Boots 15109-Ladies Helm 15106-Ladies Gauntlets 15104-Ladies Crystal Sheild[/code]

item.title: Hey i havea question about items:)
item.dc:creator: @jeviuss jeviuss
item.description:
@jeviuss wrote:

yeah there added to the item list thing, and they go into the right eqip slots and such, but i don’t know how to add a pickup or item command, they never work when i put them in:([br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 13, 2008, 05:27:14 PM[/size][hr]O_o i just added one and it turned into a crstal bow… is that normal?

Read full topic
item.source: Hey i havea question about items:)

item.title: Hey i havea question about items:)
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

it’s because they’re over 9999… you’ll have to go into your client.java, go to your ::pickup and/or ::item commands and change the max valu to like 20000 or whatever, there’s actually more to this but i never really bothered to find out…

Read full topic
item.source: Hey i havea question about items:)

item.title: Hey i havea question about items:)
item.dc:creator: @bug bug
item.description:
@bug wrote:

do you have those items added to your server? if not they will probably be spawned as nulls…

Read full topic
